meanings.definition: A person who travels to natural areas with the goal of minimizing their impact on the environment and supporting conservation efforts.
meanings.sent1: Ecotourists enjoy exploring nature while protecting the environment.
meanings.sent2: Many ecotourists visit national parks to admire wildlife and nature.
meanings.sent3: The ecotourists were so careful not to disturb the animals that they tiptoed around the forest.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of tourism, ecotourists are the unsung heroes of conservation.
meanings.sent5: The image of ecotourists picking up trash along the hiking trail stuck with me.
